apps.name: Clock
apps.script: function ClockApp(win){ let d=document.createElement('div'); let t=document.createElement('div'); t.style.fontSize='32px'; d.appendChild(t); win.appendChild(d); setInterval(()=>{t.textContent=new Date().toLocaleTimeString();},1000); }

apps.name: Notes
apps.script: function NotesApp(win){ let t=document.createElement('textarea'); t.style.width='100%'; t.style.height='100%'; t.value=localStorage.notes||''; t.oninput=()=>localStorage.notes=t.value; win.appendChild(t);}

apps.name: Paint
apps.script: function PaintApp(win){ let c=document.createElement('canvas'); c.width=500; c.height=300; let ctx=c.getContext('2d'); let draw=false; c.onmousedown=()=>draw=true; c.onmouseup=()=>draw=false; c.onmousemove=e=>{ if(draw){ let r=c.getBoundingClientRect(); ctx.fillStyle='black'; ctx.fillRect(e.clientX-r.left,e.clientY-r.top,4,4);}}; win.appendChild(c);}

apps.name: Stopwatch
apps.script: function StopwatchApp(win){ let t=0,run=false; let d=document.createElement('div'); d.style.fontSize='32px'; d.textContent='0.00'; let b=document.createElement('button'); b.textContent='Start/Stop'; setInterval(()=>{ if(run){t+=0.1; d.textContent=t.toFixed(1);} },100); b.onclick=()=>run=!run; win.appendChild(d); win.appendChild(b);}

apps.name: Timer
apps.script: function TimerApp(win){ let i=document.createElement('input'); i.placeholder='Seconds'; let b=document.createElement('button'); b.textContent='Start'; let d=document.createElement('div'); d.style.fontSize='24px'; win.appendChild(i); win.appendChild(b); win.appendChild(d); b.onclick=()=>{ let t=parseInt(i.value); let x=setInterval(()=>{d.textContent=t; t--; if(t<0){clearInterval(x); alert('DONE');}},1000);}; }
